name: Oblique Strategies
shortDescription: Random creative prompts to break mental blocks and spark breakthrough thinking

steps.name: Draw Random Prompt - Generate unexpected creative stimulus
steps.description:
Select a random, unrelated prompt to shift perspective and break conventional thinking patterns

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Generate a completely random word, phrase, or concept unrelated to this problem. Examples: 'Use an old idea', 'What would your enemy do?', 'Honor thy error as a hidden intention', 'Look closely at the most embarrassing details and amplify them'. Apply this oblique stimulus to your challenge.

steps.name: Apply Obliquely - Connect random prompt to your challenge
steps.description:
Force unexpected connections between the random prompt and your specific problem

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Take the random prompt and force connections to your challenge. How could this seemingly unrelated concept apply? What properties, functions, or characteristics could transfer? What if you took this prompt literally? What if you applied it metaphorically?

steps.name: Explore Tangents - Follow unexpected connections
steps.description: Pursue the tangential thinking paths opened by the oblique prompt

steps.name: Synthesize Insights - Integrate breakthrough perspectives
steps.description: Combine oblique insights with practical implementation approaches
